# calendlyR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

calendlyR is an API client for interacting with the Calendly API. 

## Installation

Install the development version! 

``` {r}
remotes::install_github("bill-ash/calendlyR")
```

## Example


```{r example}
#library(calendlyR)
## basic example code
```
